casebody.data:
(Eighth Circuit — Cuyahoga Co., O., Circuit Court January Term, 1888.) Bbfobe Judges Baldwin, Caldwell and Upson. Aldrich v. Marcellus. Darius Oadwell, for plaintiff. E. Sowers, for defendant.

ABSTRACTS OF DECISIONS.

Deposition in other Suit — Can not be used to contradict Witness in different Suit.

Appeal — Motion for a new trial.

Held: That a witness, not a party to the suit, may not be contradicted by statements made in a deposition given by him in another suit in which the parties in the suit were not parties, and in reference to which deposition no inquiry was made of the witness.
